Sentencas: The potential application of plasma spraying in the preparation of ceramic electrolyte for porous metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) is highlighted by its ability to eliminate the need for a high-temperature sintering process.
Titulo: Breakthrough in atmospheric plasma spraying of high-density composite electrolytes: Deposition behavior and performance of plasma-sprayed GDC-LSGM on porous metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the challenge of achieving highly dense electrolytes through plasma spraying remains to be addressed.
Titulo: Breakthrough in atmospheric plasma spraying of high-density composite electrolytes: Deposition behavior and performance of plasma-sprayed GDC-LSGM on porous metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, a novel electrolyte for porous metal-supported SOFCs (PMS-SOFCs) is developed.
Titulo: Breakthrough in atmospheric plasma spraying of high-density composite electrolytes: Deposition behavior and performance of plasma-sprayed GDC-LSGM on porous metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This involved the preparation of a highly dense structure of gadolinium-doped ceria (GDC)-lanthanum strontium gallium magnesium oxide (LSGM) composite coating using plasma spraying under atmospheric conditions.
Titulo: Breakthrough in atmospheric plasma spraying of high-density composite electrolytes: Deposition behavior and performance of plasma-sprayed GDC-LSGM on porous metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The composite electrolyte is prepared using atmospheric plasma spraying (APS).
Titulo: Breakthrough in atmospheric plasma spraying of high-density composite electrolytes: Deposition behavior and performance of plasma-sprayed GDC-LSGM on porous metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The addition of the low-meltingpoint LSGM phase enhanced the microstructural densification of the GDC-based composite coating and diminished electron loss in a reducing atmosphere, thereby improving the cell's open-circuit voltage.
Titulo: Breakthrough in atmospheric plasma spraying of high-density composite electrolytes: Deposition behavior and performance of plasma-sprayed GDC-LSGM on porous metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At 36 kW plasma arc power, the single cell with composite electrolyte exhibited a maximum power density of 371 mw/cm2 at 750 degrees C and achieved the highest open-circuit voltage (1.03 V) at 600 degrees C. Moreover, the open-circuit voltage remained stable over a 100-h test.
Titulo: Breakthrough in atmospheric plasma spraying of high-density composite electrolytes: Deposition behavior and performance of plasma-sprayed GDC-LSGM on porous metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These findings suggest that using APS to deposit a composite electrolyte with added low-melting-point secondary phases presents a promising approach for achieving relatively high OCV in PMS-SOFCs based on cerium oxide electrolytes.
Titulo: Breakthrough in atmospheric plasma spraying of high-density composite electrolytes: Deposition behavior and performance of plasma-sprayed GDC-LSGM on porous metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells
